definition: to guard/to defend/to keep watch/to abide by the law/to observe (rules or ritual)/nearby/adjoining

sentences.english: Britain will strictly abide by the one-China policy.
sentences.chinese: 英方将恪守一个中国政策。

sentences.english: He reiterated the Samoan government's firm adherence to the one-China policy.
sentences.chinese: 萨摩亚政府将坚定恪守一个中国政策。

sentences.english: But most traditional media continue to move in earnest lockstep with the government line.
sentences.chinese: 不过，最传统的媒体仍然严格恪守着政府的路线。

sentences.english: But I won't be suing as long as BP does what they've promised and compensates everyone fairly.'
sentences.chinese: 但是如果英石油恪守承诺，公平补偿，我不会起诉的。

sentences.english: First, we can't red light, abide by traffic order.
sentences.chinese: 首先，我们不能闯红灯，恪守交通秩序。

sentences.english: That's why Confucian advocates middlebrow and tolerance, namely, following humanity and morality, doing things in medium manner.
sentences.chinese: 所以儒家讲中庸和包容，即恪守仁道，无过无不及。

sentences.english: The pragmatist mayors pride themselves on being result-oriented.
sentences.chinese: 这些讲究实用的市长们以恪守“效果至上”为荣。

sentences.english: Satanists within the Church of Satan adhere to these as guidelines on how to live.
sentences.chinese: 一个成绩“”撒旦的撒旦教会恪守这些原则如何生活。

sentences.english: Enterprises abide by quality and revitalize enterprise's principle, adhere to the sincere management theory.
sentences.chinese: 企业恪守质量兴企原则，坚持诚信经营理念。

sentences.english: About have an exam, I definitely observe the school regulation.
sentences.chinese: 关于测验自己必然恪守黉舍地规则。

sentences.english: The government of Cape Verde abides by the one-China principle and supports China's grand cause of reunification.
sentences.chinese: 佛政府恪守一个中国原则，支持中国统一大业。

sentences.english: We hope the US side honor its commitment and cautiously and properly handle Tibet-related issues.
sentences.chinese: 希望美方恪守承诺，谨慎妥善处理涉藏问题。

sentences.english: Liu Xizai kept Confucian belief in his whole life and he put special emphasis on the cultivation of personality.
sentences.chinese: 刘熙载一生恪守着儒家信仰，特别重视人格修养。

sentences.english: People scrupulously abide by filial piety in traditional Chinese family.
sentences.chinese: 在道统的中国家庭里，人们恪守孝道。

sentences.english: In a traditional Chinese family filial piety is rigidly observed.
sentences.chinese: 在传统的中国家庭里，人们恪守孝道。

definition: to comply with/to abide by/to respect (an agreement)
to take orders/to receive commands/to carry on (a tradition)
to follow/to abide by/to comply with/compliance
to comply with/to follow (directives)/to defer (to the judgment of superiors)
to hold fast to/to stick to
to go against/to be contrary to/to violate
